long_description: The Pacsafe Metrosafe 200 GII keeps you well-organized and protected with 5 anti-theft features. When you're out for the entire day and need storage that won't weigh you down, look no further. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into areas normally targeted by bag slashers. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is integrated into the adjustable carry strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at 1 end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture sonobody can walk off with your bag. Large main zippered compartment; zippered organizer pocket includes large slip pocket. Bright colored liner adds some fun and helps you easily locate what you need, when you need it; padded electronic pocket fits up to a 10 in. laptop. Rear zippered pocket with concealable zipper pull prevents a pickpocket from reaching into your bag. 2 water bottle/umbrella side pockets. Pacsafe Metrosafe 200 includes a headphone port, pen holder and key clip.
short_description: The Pacsafe Metrosafe 200 GII keeps you well-organized and protected with 5 anti-theft features. When you're out for the entire day and need storage that won't weigh you down, look no further.
